name: What Linus Bruckman Sees When His Eyes Are Closed
name_original: What Linus Bruckman Sees When His Eyes Are Closed
description:
FEATURES
  • Dual-story gameplay
  • Multiple Endings
  • English and Japanese Language
  • A dynamic music system
  • An exciting and bizarre story
  • Another exciting and bizarre story
  • Gods, aliens, samurai, and Charlton Heston
“With a cleverly written story and dialogue, finely tuned gameplay, and an abundance of fresh ideas, Linus is a must-try game for all adventure lovers.”

         –Adventure Gamer
